page.title: 16TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: In our village we carried out a traffic survey to see how many vehicles go by in a day. We started at 8am and finished at 5pm. There were 350 lorries, 580 cars,16 buses and coaches, 199 motor bikes and bikes but only 7 tractors. The reason why there are so many lorries is because they go to the pit. Some carry rubbish, some sand, some cement from the ready mix depot. Many of the cars bring children to and from school. The busiest times are between 9am and 10am. The least busy time was between 10am and 11am.
